item.title: My Rails Patch: reload on default scope – committed!
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: uiuiui, long time no read, as I’m quite busy lately. Just a quick update, my rails patch – fixing ‘reload’ on a AR with default scope – got finally committed – nice: http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/4db72b702f7faca7da30a64e45daeee13733762a
item.content:encoded:
